name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James R. HALL, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James R. HALL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Susan Y. Kahn, Haverford, for J.R. Hall.
Catherine Marshall, Karen L. Grigsby, Ronald Eisenberg, Philadelphia, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
639 A.2d 1169
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James R. HALL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 20, 1993.
Decided March 24, 1994.
Susan Y. Kahn, Haverford, for J.R. Hall.
Catherine Marshall, Karen L. Grigsby, Ronald Eisenberg, Philadelphia, for Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
